wikitext.*:
'''Cypresses''' were a type of tree that grew in the northern marches of [[Ithilien]].<ref>{{Cite DTP|LR 4.04.011}}</ref>

During [[Berúthiel]]'s time as the [[Queen of Gondor|wife]] of [[King of Gondor|King]] [[Tarannon]] of [[Gondor]], she decorated the gardens of the [[King's House]] in [[Osgiliath]] "with tormented sculptures beneath cypresses and [[yews]]".<ref>{{UT|13a}}, note 7, pp. 401-2</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1994: ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]—[[Treasures of Middle-earth (2nd edition)|Treasures of Middle-earth]]''''' 
:A type of cypress, '''''Black Cypress''''', is described as the largest evergreen growing in southeastern [[Middle-earth]], growing up to 200 ft. Its trunk was black and the scale-like leaves were dark green. Its hard to work wood was used for shipbuilding.<ref>{{ICE|2010}}, p. 191</ref>
